text:
[Verse]
City lights are shining
On a midnight rooftop
Stars are winking softly
We won't ever stop

[Verse 2]
Dancing in the moonlight
Turning up the sound
Laughing with the night sky
Feet up off the ground

[Chorus]
Oh we sing and shout
Under skies so clear
In a world so loud
We find magic here

[Verse 3]
Echoes from the alley
Whispers in the dark
Up above the chaos
We ignite the spark

[Bridge]
Feel the wind it’s blowing
Carry dreams so far
On this midnight rooftop
We know who we are

[Chorus]
Oh we sing and shout
Under skies so clear
In a world so loud
We find magic here
title: Midnight Rooftop
